title: Cognitive Style-Based Design for Deepening Mathematical Concept Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics concepts (discrete math, geometry, etc.) understanding and VR environment experience
context.additional_context: Accessing VR simulations via personal devices, learning by converting mathematical concepts into multiple representations (text/graphics/diagrams)

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their cognitive style (verbal/object visualization) and apply it to learning strategies.
Achieve over 85% accuracy in interconverting mathematical theories into textual, visual, and schematic formats
Improve problem-solving rates by 40% through the use of cognitive-style-tailored materials when addressing mathematical problems in VR simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
